DarkMouse::

She felt a chill run up her spine. She shuddered. She had a feeling 
that thing were going to get ugly very soon.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest snarls, looking at the screen DarkMouse was looking at.
> 
> "I see. Very well, can you scramble the codes so we are the only 
ones 
> that have access, and then set the internal defences on him."
> 
> He gives an order over the team's internal communication system. 
> EndBringer, Greven, and Demise nod. They turns and exit the room, 
> heading for the CR room.
> 
> Killfest turns to DarkMouse. "DrillBit will be disposed of."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > DarkMouse::
> > 
> > She listened in on the conversation. "Hey, Killfest.  I got 
> something 
> > for you. Drillbit thinks he's going to be the leader. I thought 
you 
> > were going to be the leader.  Well, it looks like we got a stand 
> off 
> > for leader."
